Bio: This Is Dragster.....No bullshit emo, no bubblegum punk, no cock rock just dirty sleazy rock n roll played with sweat and blood. If you like your women with a bit of filth and you take your music with a bit of speed then check them out if not piss off and go put The Saturdays on and have a wank over the talented one!!! Formed in the mid noughties dragSTER have been produced by Rat Scabies, managed by Jah Wobble, drawn by Vince Ray, and singer Fi did a 40 date stint singing for noise merchants Pigface touring the USA. The band have played every stinkhole venue in the UK many times to a growing number of loyal fans. dragSTER wear their influences on their sleeves citing artists as diverse as Motorhead, Mudhoney, The Pixies, Johnny Cash, Dead Kennedys and Jon Spencer as inspiration. The bands love of sci-fi, horror and 50's B-movies are also prevelant in their music. dragSTER's first album "Step Into The Deathray" released in 2006 on German label Noisemaker was a critical success and on the back of this the band were invited to play various festivals including Speedfreaks, Rebellion, and Concrete Jungle. With the newly released second album "Here Come The Meat Robots" (STP Records 2010) already causing a buzz in the UK and Europe the band have a string of dates booked for 2011 including Rebellion Festival, Fuck Download, Wickerman and many more, including two UK tours and a Canadian tour
